metadata.title: USN-5838-1 -- AdvanceCOMP vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that AdvanceCOMP did not properly manage memory while performing read operations on MNG file. If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted MNG file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause AdvanceCOMP to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2022-35014, CVE-2022-35017, CVE-2022-35018, CVE-2022-35019, CVE-2022-35020)  It was discovered that AdvanceCOMP did not properly manage memory while performing read operations on ZIP file. If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted ZIP file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause AdvanceCOMP to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2022-35015, CVE-2022-35016)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5838-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  advancecomp - 1.20-1ubuntu0.2+esm2 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
